format: html

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- c(-2, -1, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
df2 <- seq(-2, 5, .5)
df1 <- df^2
df1
```

```{r}
plot(df)
plot(df, df^2)
plot(df, df1, type="l")
plot(df2, df2^2, type="l")
```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  stat_function(fun = function(x) x^2, xlim=c(-2, 5))
```

```{r}
f <- function(x) {
  x^2 
}
f(df)

```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  stat_function(fun = function(x) {
    if(x < 1) {
      2*x
    }
    else{3}})
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  stat_function(fun = function(x) {
    ifelse(x < 1, 2*x, 3)
  }, xlim=c(-2, 5))
```
